api_list.name: Summary
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://play-to-earn-blockchain-games.p.rapidapi.com/project/summary-market"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "play-to-earn-blockchain-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://play-to-earn-blockchain-games.p.rapidapi.com/project/summary-market"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
